result.title: Report on offline events 3
result.description: Event 3 Report. Although we will receive quantitative information on figures and type of attendants from the events that are held, qualitative information will be more important. The information we obtain from the questions put forward to the speakers, as well as from the manifestos written up at the end of each event, will provide us with very useful findings in order to redirect our efforts, if needed, in communication and FACEs overall strategies. It will also provide clues on how aspiring entrepreneurs should act, and how the authorities can help to boost entrepreneurship in each area. All these factors will lead to an increase in impact.

result.title: Design Options Paper
result.description: A collaboratively written Design Options Paper DOP will be delivered at the end of M10 as the main output of the FUNDCELERATOR project This DOP document will be presented as a guide with recommendations to other innovation support providers for the development of a similar fund raising support programme in their own context but targeting the same welldefined target group of SMEs It will present the different options to address the identified common challenge and show how certain decisions made in the design preclude some other options In order to ensure the DOP to serve as a real guide for other innovation support organizations not having participated to the project itself nor having benefited from a presentation of it it will be drafted as a selfstanding document
